root.name: Atlantis Evolution
root.description: OverviewIn the 4th game of the Atlantis popular adventure series: players take the role of Curtis Hewitt, a 25 year old journalist. On his way home from assignment in Patagonia, Curtis awakens to find the ocean liner he's on going down in a mysterious storm. Things take another turn for the worst as the lifeboat Curtis escaped on is sucked down by an enormous water-vortex. Yet, the real adventure begins as he comes to in the heart of the lost city of Atlantis.
